resources.string: This app aims to connect various academics of similar research interests with each other, while also providing a visual heat map to show the user other academics in their map’s range.

This problem was first brought to our attention by Dr Weisi Guo and Dr Maria Liakata. They discussed the many problems of trying to meet people in their area of research. Some of the problems that they faced included talking to academics that were not in their field of research, talking to the professors’ students rather than the professor themselves, and many more. As a result this was how the 4th year project came about.

Hao Dong - Project Manager/Client Side Developer

Loucas Stylianou - Client Side Developer

Sirandjivy Gocouladasse alias Soulormane - Client Side Developer
